title: National Geographic
description: Venture into the wilds of Alaska to experience the untouched landscapes and epic beauty of Americaâ€™s final frontier. Discover the tidewater glaciers and mist-shrouded fjords of the Inside Passage on an expedition cruise, or head inland to Denali National Park to seek out moose and grizzly bears and hike amid soaring peaks with a seasoned naturalist.

title: Treasures of the Inside Passage: Alaska and British Columbia
description: Accompanying each expedition is a diverse team of experts - from naturalists to regional specialists - who will share their knowledge and insights into the wildlife, landscape and local culture. Select a member of the expedition team below to see their bio and dates.
